attributes.action: It should be illegal for a Member of Parliament to have any other employment
attributes.additional_details:
Being a member of Parliament paid for by public is a vocation not  simply a job

It simply cannot be possible to be an MP and have any other outside employment interests and perform the expected duties
attributes.background:
An MP needs to be exclusively focussed on their role representing their constituency and any other ministerial duties
Any other employment needs to be given up at the point of becoming an MP
